value:
$WmMPID_春祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_SpringFes21,Face|Bunny ears and a fluffy tail... It is not
the flattering look I would hope to be
wearing to a festival.$k$pI'm a bit embarrassed to be seen
in such an outfit!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|It is indeed somewhat mortifying...$k$pBut my understanding is that those
in my service have dressed similarly
while attending. Even so...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|Hey, you two! You better not let
your embarrassment hold me back!
I want to take this festival by storm!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|Aw, c'mon! We only lost because
you were so caught up in your
own head!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_SpringFes21,Face|I-I'm sorry, Severa... I'll do better
next time, OK? You don't need to
keep pulling on my ears!$k$p$Sbs150|
